titles.title: Gekijouban Perrine Monogatari
劇場版・ペリーヌ物語

anime.description: * Based on the novel En Famille by the French author http://anidb.net/cr9700 [Hector-Henri Malot], a follow-up to his better known work Sans Famille. http://anidb.net/ch8032 [Perrine] travels across Europe with her http://anidb.net/ch8033 [mother], a photographer, in a cabin lead by a donkey. They are heading to a small village in north France, the home of Perrine`s dead http://anidb.net/ch75930 [father]. Perrine doesn`t know that they are unwanted in the village, since the father left the village after having quarrelled with his http://anidb.net/ch8035 [father], and married in India against his father`s will. After her mother falls ill, Perrine has to sell everything, including her beloved donkey Palikare, to pay for medicine. Mother dies in Paris, and before dying tells the girl that she has to make her grandfather love her before he knows who she really is. After a journey full of hardships, Perrine finally arrives in the village, where she learns that her grandfather is the rich owner of the factory that feeds all the villagers. Presenting herself by a false name, Perrine gets a job at the factory, searching for a way to the heart of her grandfather. Source: ANN
